title: Sugar-free mincemeat
ingredients: ['50g vegetable suet', '240g dried fruit (sultanas, raisins, dates, apricots, cranberries, etc.)', '60g chopped cherries', '1 small apple, grated', '1 orange or clementine, juiced and zested', '1 tablespoon apple puree or concentrate', '1 tablespoon treacle or honey', '60 to 80ml port', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/2 teaspoon ground cloves']
